overview_of_class: An analysis whose topics will be determined by student interest. Those of you who would like to work in Analysis should think over what you want to learn and let me know. Possible topics: spectral geometry on Riemannian manifolds, Quantum Chaos, or (in quite another direction) Monge-Ampere equations and geodesics in the space of Kahler metrics.
name: Topics in Analysis
title: WCAS MATH 511-1-1 Topics in Analysis
